extendedInfo.description: Log in and check out your Esso Extra account no matter where you are! Track your points, monitor your progress towards rewards, find exclusive offers or get directions to the closest Esso station. Esso Extra is the fastest way to the rewards you want. Your points add up fast! Whether itâs at the pump or in the store, every eligible purchase adds up to points that can be redeemed for great rewards such as gas, car washes, gift cards and more. Requires Android 2.2 or higher. While we make efforts to ensure that the apps are robust and reliable, due to their nature, it is possible that they may not function all the time, and in some circumstances, they may not function at all. Imperial Oil does not assume any liability that may arise when an app does not function as expected. Esso and Esso Extra are trademarks of Imperial Oil Limited. Imperial Oil, licensee.

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Not a good app. Cannot access my account (login). No options under settings except unit of distance measure and language. No \'push\' as outlined in the instructions. Deleting now.
reviews.author: Charlie Campagnaro

reviews.comment: This app does not seem to be compatible with Android phones... Ever time I try to log in I get a \" connection issue\" ( no connection) notification. This is when I have full bars and have easy access to all other apps. At this stage, this app is useless to me
reviews.author: Dan Rivett

reviews.title: Can\'t sine in
reviews.comment: WTF!!!! It does not work!! Can\'t even sine in to my account.  :(
reviews.author: Nickholas Hampton

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: What a useless app.
reviews.author: Gerald Buffalo

reviews.title: Nice to know how much point i am at
reviews.comment: Nice to be able to brouse and know how many point i have and what i can get.  Basic app that does what i need to know.  Installed and work right away.  No problem at all with the install.
reviews.author: Yves L

reviews.title: \"No connection\"!?
reviews.comment: Why no connection? It worked 1st after I installed, then never. What\'s the point or good of having an app that never works?! Uninstall!
reviews.author: DBCuzitis

reviews.title: Sad...
reviews.comment: Was expecting a bit more than this. Poor design and user experience. Only serving me one purpose right now, that is to see how many points I have.
reviews.author: Jay Jung

reviews.title: No good vary poot
reviews.comment: This app is no f n good you put in your valet e mail and it tell YOU  it not valet do NOT down lord this app and no fn number to call it TELLS you what your email not for you to tell them     .
reviews.author: Anthony Colangelo

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Installed for the 500 bonus points but wouldn\'t accept my login info. Works on the Web, but not the app. Several days of being locked out of the app, try again.. Even reset my password multiple times. Several weeks go by. No bonus, still can\'t login. Contact support. Eons later, they reset my info and it works. BS. No bonus. No logical use. Uninstall.
reviews.author: TJ Johnston

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: It is what I have been searching for a long time.  Works great first time!
reviews.author: Ron Andres

reviews.title: Esso extra
reviews.comment: Its great shows me point balance and what I can get and order what I want with my points good for me
reviews.author: David Hurd

reviews.title: Easily one of the worst
reviews.comment: Use half of the screen, can\'t exit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing on LG
reviews.author: Victor Martinez

reviews.comment: Crashing on s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Logout?
reviews.comment: One serious problem. Logout. Force-closing should not be the resolution. Update required. Email me when you fix the issues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just bad...
reviews.comment: This is really bad app slow and unresponsive, can\'t log in and kept saying not connected, fail!.  Can anyone confirm the 500 points apply to android too? Otherwise I see no point keeping this junk app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: mini-browser
reviews.comment: This app is not fast or even efficient.  it appears to me to be similar to a browser, open blocks (empty) where data is downloaded to. The app takes a little time to load , just like a browser.  the app could use RSS feeds to speed things up. In addition the app does not utilise the screen properly, where a browser would.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to be fixed
reviews.comment: Works fine on galaxy nexus, and doesn\'t work on nexus 7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not really interesting.
reviews.comment: Does not do anything that I can\'t do with other apps...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Very poorly done!
reviews.author: A Google User
